channel.title: ~ mechscape: the future of runescape ~ what do you think?
channel.description:
the release date? is unkown
but the ideas and hints they gave to us so far... are we gunna make mechscape p servers?
prob... but... how would we make customs for it lol... it would be like everythings a freaking bow or a GFX no swords i dont think lol

item.title: ~ mechscape: the future of runescape ~ what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

In case you guys didn’t know. What used to be called mechscape is now called ‘stellar dawn’. Also it uses the same exact client that runescape does, with a different cache.

What this means is that a runescape private server will work with few or no modifications as a stellar dawn private server. (all you would want to change are the strings you send)

Read full topic
item.source: ~ mechscape: the future of runescape ~ what do you think?

item.title: ~ mechscape: the future of runescape ~ what do you think?

@Scape-JAVA wrote:

There probably will be private server’s in the future.

item.title: ~ mechscape: the future of runescape ~ what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Kihomura:

Yes, I’m sure there will be private servers, though I don’t think they will be supported here since this is a RuneScape private server community, but you never know.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:299651”]Meh.

http://stellardawncheats.com/
http://stellardawncheats.org/
http://stellardawnservers.com/
http://stellardawnservers.org/[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: ~ mechscape: the future of runescape ~ what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I could barely understand what the fuck you said, but I got a few words here and there.

Yes, I’m sure there will be private servers, though I don’t think they will be supported here since this is a RuneScape private server community, but you never know.

As long as we have the cache for it, there will be custom items. (atleast that’s what i think you mean when you say “customs”)

Read full topic
